Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Notebook for Nannerl, KV 1–8

c. 1761–1764

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 32' 30"

  • 20. Piece in C major, KV 5a
  • 24. Allegro in B-flat major, KV 8/1
  • 25. Andante in F major, KV 6/2
  • 26. Minuet in C major, KV 6/3i
  • 46. Allegro in C major, KV 6/1
  • 47. Minuet in D major, KV 7/3i
  • 48. Minuet in F major, KV 6/3ii
  • 49. Minuet in F major, KV 4
  • 50. Piece in G major
  • 51. Concerto movement in G major
  • 53. Andante in C major, KV 1a
  • 54. Allegro in C major, KV 1b
  • 55. Allegro in F major, KV 1c
  • 56. Minuet in F major, KV 1d
  • 58. Minuet in F major, KV 2
  • 59. Allegro in B-flat major, KV 3
  • 61. Minuet in F major, KV 5
  • 62. Minuet in G major, KV 1e
  • 63. Minuet in C major, KV 1f
  • 64. Piece in B-flat major, KV 5b

Most pieces in the Notebook for Nannerl are anonymous; only those believed to have been written by Mozart are given here. Works are numbered as in the Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (IX/27/1), which gives first the pieces whose original positions are known (nos. 1–52) followed by those pieces on separate sheets whose positions are not known (nos 53–64). All Köchel catalogue entries used here are from the sixth version of the catalogue. Below is a correspondence between the different catalogue versions.

pieceKV1KV2KV3KV6

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/1 · BA 4583-01 · Klavierstücke / Band 1: Die Notenbücher · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Associated Board: · 25 Early Pieces · ed. Howard Ferguson [KV 1a, 1b, 1c, 1d, 1e, 1f, 2, 3, 4, 5 and 5a]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9177 · Die Notenbücher der Geschwister Mozart · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [KV 1a, 1b, 1c, 1d, 1e, 1f, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5a, 5b, 6/1, 6/2, 6/3i, 6/3ii, 7/3i and 8/1]
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [KV 1a, 1b, 1c, 1d, 1e, 1f, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5a, 5b, 6/1, 6/2, 6/3i, 6/3ii, 7/3i and 8/1]
  • Henle · HN 1236 · Klavierstücke aus dem Nannerl-Notenbuch · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [KV 1a, 1b, 1c, 1d, 1e, 1f, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5a, 6/1, 6/2, 6/3i, 6/3ii, 7/3i and 8/1]
  • Könemann · K 113 · Klavierstücke · ed. István Máriássy [KV 1a, 1b, 1c, 1d, 1e, 1f, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5a, 6/1, 6/2, 6/3i, 6/3ii, 7/3i and 8/1]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50229 · Klavierstücke / Band 1: Frühere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [KV 1a, 1b, 1c, 1d, 1e, 1f, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5a, 5b, 6/1, 6/2, 6/3i, 6/3ii, 7/3i and 8/1, with completion of KV 5b by Robert Levin]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50262 · Stücke aus dem Nannerl-Notenbuch · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [KV 1a, 1b, 1c, 1d, 1e, 1f, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5a, 5b, 6/1, 6/2, 6/3i, 6/3ii, 7/3i and 8/1, with completion of KV 5b by Robert Levin]

20. Piece in C major, KV 5a

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

24. Allegro in B-flat major, KV 8/1

This piece also exists in an arrangement for violin and piano as part of a sonata in B-flat major (KV 8).

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

25. Andante in F major, KV 6/2

This piece also exists in an arrangement for violin and piano as part of a sonata in C major (KV 6).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 1.5

This piece also exists in an arrangement for violin and piano as part of a sonata in C major (KV 6).

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1

This piece also exists in an arrangement for violin and piano as part of a sonata in C major (KV 6).

Difficulty: 2

Difficulty: 1.5

62. Minuet in G major, KV 1e
